detail_desc: Boxy cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. V-neck, sparkly stone buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Calf-length skirt in a textured cotton weave with a high waist with wide elastication and a raw-edge frill trim at the top. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the top and a slit at the back.
Leggings in a stretch cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a longer style with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a lightly brushed finish. Straight, relaxed fit with dropped shoulders.
Tights with an elasticated waist. 20 denier.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover shoulder straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.

Soft, non-wired lace bralettes with mesh-lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Wide shoulder straps, a lace trim at the hem and a wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, gently draping jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck.

Cropped, sleeveless top in a plumeti viscose weave with pleats and lace details at the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and ties at the top. Narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the top and hem.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in a knit containing glittery threads. Hat with a bow on the front and ribbed hem.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
5-pocket, calf-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist and straight legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Knee-length shorts in a herringbone weave with a high waist, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and legs with creases.
5-pocket trousers in stretch, supersoft twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Tunic in a gently draping crêpe weave with a stand-up collar with metal eyelets and a tab with a metal fastener at the top. Draped front, yoke at the back with a pleat for added width, long sleeves and wide, close-fitting cuffs with a slit and press-stud. High slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Jumper in a soft, ribbed chunky knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and shoulder straps. Finer ribbing around the neckline and hem and short slits in the sides. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Fine-knit jumper in soft wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft slub cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections on the legs. High, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved top in soft, slub cotton jersey with an appliqué on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Sandals in patterned ethylene-vinyl acetate with a small loop at the back and straps with hook and loop fasteners. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester. Moulded insoles with a textured pattern to give the feet a better grip, and patterned soles.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and dropped shoulders with a press-stud at one side. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Elasticated hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium support.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Dress in tulle with sequined embroidery. Concealed press-studs at the back, butterfly sleeves in a double layer of tulle, and a gathered seam with a scalloped trim at the waist that creates width in the skirt. Sewn-in satin underdress.
Socks in a fine knit containing glittery threads.

Push-up bra with lace-covered, underwired, thickly padded cups that maximise the bust for a fuller cleavage, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastener at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Flat cap in a woven wool blend. Cotton lining.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Sleeveless dress in soft slub cotton jersey with a lace-covered bodice at the front, gathered seam at the waist and skirt that is slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a deep V-neck, long trumpet sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a peplum and detachable belt.
Patterned bikini. Lined, off-the-shoulder top with covered elastication and flounces at the top. Fully lined bottoms.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced hems and back and adjustable elastic braces. Zip fly and press-stud, elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective strip on one leg. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while running. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch for increased ventilation. Legs with reflective details for increased visibility outdoors and a slit in one side of the hems. Soft jersey inner shorts.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Knee-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned weave with a high, gathered waist and concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the hips for added width. Unlined.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket and chest pocket with a button. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a belt, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and nylon weave with peak lapels and an opening with a button at the top. Long balloon sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, shaping pleats at the waist and slits in the sides.
Flared skirt in glittery tulle. Shimmering elastic waistband with a sewn-on bow. Lined.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, patch front pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Lined.
Bomber jacket in sturdy jersey with a small stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Flap chest pockets, discreet side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Swimsuit with a lined gusset.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and lined hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shorts in a cotton and linen weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Vest top in airy jersey made from a cotton blend with deep armholes.

Long coat in woven fabric containing viscose with a collar, concealed buttons at the front and a tie belt at the waist. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs, open chest pockets, pockets in the side seams and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs.
Sleeveless sports bodysuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a low-cut neckline at the back and a high cut legs at the back.
Cropped top in stretch cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Cotton trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Coat in a felted wool blend containing some cashmere. Narrow notch lapels with a buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets, two inner pockets, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. One dress is patterned.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Long, high-waisted skirt in a viscose weave with covered elastication at the waist and gathered seams creating tiers at the thighs and knees for added width. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit jumper with long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Pyjama bottoms in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Thigh boots in soft imitation suede with a drawstring at the top and pointed toes. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Hipster briefs in jersey with a low waist, wide elastic waistband and lined gusset.
